abstract: Apple said it would bring the prices on its iTunes digital music store in Britain in line with those on the Continent to settle an antitrust case.
snippet: Apple said it would bring the prices on its iTunes digital music store in Britain in line with those on the Continent to settle an antitrust case.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  Apple said on Wednesday that it had agreed to cut the prices on its iTunes digital music store in Britain to align them with those on the Continent, settling an antitrust case brought by European regulators.

headline.main: Apple to Cut the Prices of iTunes in Britain
headline.print_headline: Apple to Cut The Prices Of iTunes In Britain
